text: Wijesinghe Jayaweera Mudiyanselage Lokubandara (Sinhala:විජෙසිංහ ජයවීර මුදියන්සේලාගේ ලොකුබණ්ඩාර, Tamil:விஜேசிங்க ஜயவீர முதியன்சேலாகே லொக்குபண்டார; 5 August 1941 - 14 February 2021), commonly known as W. J. M. Lokubandara, was a Sri Lankan politician. He was Speaker of the Parliament of Sri Lanka from 2004 to 2010 and Governor of Sabaragamuwa Province from 2010 to 2015. Lokubandara died at a hospital in the Colombo District from problems caused by COVID-19 on 14 February 2021, aged 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Speakers of the Parliament of Sri Lanka Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Sri Lanka
title: W. J. M. Lokubandara
